column4: Is there a good bittorrent client that can accept resuming? Azureus just crashes if I start it up after an X crash, so i plainly lose my downloaded bits. bittornado in curses interface doesn't resume my downloads, anybody know of one that can resume downloads and have a download cap that I can set up?
ah, I'll search info for it, thanks for givin' a name :)
make sure to read the manpage for it, it's CLI based
